member.name: T:TG.INI.Controls.IniEditor.DisplayModes
member.summary: Represents modes of the GUI.

member.name: F:TG.INI.Controls.IniEditor.DisplayModes.Standalone
member.summary: This will cause a top tool bar to be shown that includes a New, Open and Save button.

member.name: F:TG.INI.Controls.IniEditor.DisplayModes.Dialog
member.summary: This will hide the top tool bar and show an Ok and Cancel button at the bottom of the window.

member.name: P:TG.INI.Controls.IniEditor.CanEncrypt
member.summary: Gets whether an EncryptionKey property is set and the length is greater than zero.

member.name: P:TG.INI.Controls.IniEditor.Dirty
member.summary: Gets or sets if the document has changed.

member.name: P:TG.INI.Controls.IniEditor.DisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets how the editor window is setup.
member.remarks: There are two options available for this property; Standalone and Dialog. When the Standalone option is selected, a tool bar is shown with the buttons New, Open and Save. When the Dialog option is shown, the tool bar is hidden and OK and Cancel button is shown at the bottom of the window.

member.summary: Gets or sets the that is being viewed.

member.name: P:TG.INI.Controls.IniEditor.DocumentPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path to a INI file. This is only used in Standalone mode.

members.member:
A FX 3.5 way to mimic the FX4 "HasFlag" method.
The tested enum.10 The value to test. True if the flag is set. Otherwise false.
